name: Terraform (itch) (Blackhyphen)
description:
This was my first game I built when starting a University, it's just simple 3D platformer.

The narrative premise is that you're on a planet to terraform it, but you start finding lots of mysterious things. 

It is only a test level and there are many things that if I was to go back to it, I would do differently, but it is what it is and I am proud of it.

Controls:

WASD - Moves the character

Mouse - Looks around

X - Crouch, Roll while moving & drop from ledges

The objective of the demo is to find and collect the artifact.
